title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 334.3 - Voting faculty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 334.3 - Voting faculty

State Regulations

The voting faculty of each college shall be composed
of: (a) the chancellor and the chief
administrative officer of the college; and
(b) members of the academic staff of the
college having academic rank and term or continuing appointment; and
(c) such other officers of administration and
staff members of the college as may be specified by the faculty bylaws of the
college. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
334.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
